entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
